hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Wednesday Yellow - Flowers
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Good Morning All</center>

### <center> 1st entry for today's #colorchallenge by @kalemandra</center>

<hr>

<center>This picture was taken on my recent trip to Coorg - The Scotland of India. I do not really know the name of the flower so if any one knows please </center>

<hr>

![_DSC0160.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcGELdQrcrLw5QQkyfhLhd1GboXNhdEjjc4BVPSA2dE8R/_DSC0160.jpg)

<hr>

<center>Camera - Nokia 6, 16 MP Back Camera</center>

<hr>

# <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>
